Posts.EditableText: I've seen other games do it and i can't quite figure out how to do it but how do i get the verb examine to work?
Posts.HTML: I've seen other games do it and i can't quite figure out how to do it but how do i get the verb examine to work?

Posts.EditableText: examine is a build-in verb so you only  must add some text in the description field of an object
